org.openimaj.audio

Class JavaSoundAudioGrabber

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.Audio
      • org.openimaj.audio.AudioStream
        • org.openimaj.audio.AudioGrabber
          • org.openimaj.audio.JavaSoundAudioGrabber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SampleChunk>, Runnable

    public class JavaSoundAudioGrabber
extends AudioGrabber
    Audio grabber that uses the Java Sound API as a sound source.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    Created:
    28 Oct 2011

      • getLength

        public long getLength()
        Returns the length of the audio stream in milliseconds. If the length is unknown (for a live stream for example), then this method should return -1.
        Specified by:
        getLength in class AudioStream
        Returns:
        The length in milliseconds, or -1
